summary: Story of the lives of three Soviet pilots who are united by disaster in a small town in the mountains.
cast: Georgi Zhzhyonov|Anatoliy Vasilev|Leonid Filatov|Aleksandra Yakovleva-Aasmyae|Irina Akulova|Yekaterina Vasilyeva|Yuriy Gorobets|Aleksandr Pavlov|Galina Gladkova|Komaki Kurihara|Ivan Agafonov|Vadim Aleksandrov|Larisa Barabanova|Aleksandr Belyavskiy|Leonid Chubarov|Aleftina Evdokimova|Anna Frolovtseva|Guranda Gabunia|Yuri Gusev|Tatyana Ignatova|Vladimir Ivanov|Elena Koreneva|Lyudmila Korshakova|Lyudmila Kudryavtseva|Aleksandr Kuzmichyov|Tatyana Kuznetsova|Vladimir Marenkov|Gennadiy Matveev|Roma Monin|Aleksandra Nazarova|Aleksandr Pashutin|Aleksandr Potapov|Pavel Remezov|Klara Rumyanova|Ivan Ryzhov|Irina Sanpiter|Irina Savina|Aleksandr Sheyn Sr.|Mariya Skvortsova|Nikolay Smorchkov|Anton Tabakov|Anna Varpakhovskaya|Lyudmila Velikaya|Oleg Vidov|Ivan Voronov|Sergey Yakovlev|Aleksey Yakubov|German Yushko|Konstantin Zakharov|Robert Zotov|Nikolay Lebedev
title: Aeropuerto en llamas
